Kian Ravaei

Kian is an undergraduate Music Composition major. He strives to help learners achieve their learning goals through empathy, honesty, and purposeful design.

Featured Projects:

Wheel of Sources

An interactive game show about primary and secondary sources.

Contacting Instructors

A guide to contacting instructors via email and in person.
